reference.title: Synology WRX560 Hardware Parts
reference.shortdesc: Knowing the different parts of your Synology WRX560 router's hardware is key to a proper set-up!

dlentry.dd: Your Wi-Fi router, which gets attached to the modem with cables to facilitate an internet connection between the modem and your devices
A device that connects your home to your Internet Service Provider by translating the network signal into a format your devices can use
A device that converts AC (alternating current) into DC (direct current) from your wall outlet to provide the correct amount of power and voltage your router needs
TA cable that connects your router to your wired devices (like computers) to facilitate a Wi-Fi connection
